poem:
### Industrial Echoes

voices lob  
like iron  
through corridors  
of power—  
sharp, biting,  
unforgiving hail.  
  
robes of rhetoric  
tattered,  
young dreams  
wilt, unpursued.  
  
yet from  
ashen whispers  
birds must rise  
to bridge  
the gap  
between silence  
and hope—  
unflagging,  
undaunted.
